data.title: Tom Cruise = Insecure About His Height?
data.meta_description:
How is this possible?



According to IMDb, Katie Holmes is 5' 9" tall... Tom Cruise is 5' 7" tall. Yet, in this picture, he appears to be at least 2"...
data.text:
clayj

macrumors 604

Jan 14, 2005

7,636

1,280

visiting from downstream

Feb 8, 2006

#1

How is this possible?

According to IMDb, Katie Holmes is 5' 9" tall... Tom Cruise is 5' 7" tall. Yet, in this picture, he appears to be at least 2" taller. Is he wearing lifts? Did they make Katie stand in a trench when they shot this picture?

Good grief.

EricNau

Moderator emeritus

Apr 27, 2005

10,728

281

San Francisco, CA

Feb 8, 2006

#2

Tom Cruise should be insecure about his brain capacity...

0

Feb 8, 2006

#3

I heard he wears platform shoes and has a carry-along box to stand on during photo-shoots

Feb 8, 2006

#4

^LOL......there was one time when tom boy was on top of the world...now its like he's about to fall off it.

Bless

Feb 8, 2006

#5

Yes, he is.

When Tom and Nicole split, she made an off the cuff remark about finally being able to wear high heels again. It's also a pretty prevalent rumor that he wears shoes with platforms in them for most of his films, and that camera angles are shot in a manner to make him look taller (think John Rhys-Davies in the LOTR trilogy, except taller and not shorter).

Hmmm... I wonder if his insecurity about his height is also related to Scientology somehow?

[Edit]: Is it me, or does Katie look *really strung out* in that photo? I wonder if this is also related to Scientology somehow?

kiwi-in-uk

FoxyKaye said:

... Is it me, or does Katie look *really strung out* in that photo? ...

He was standing on her foot to get the extra lift. Secret levitation technique acquired only after years of instruction, studying truth, and acting classes.

FoxyKaye said:

[Edit]: Is it me, or does Katie look *really strung out* in that photo? I wonder if this is also related to Scientology somehow?

She's with Tom Cruise, there has to be something wrong with her. I imagine Tom Cruise has insecurities. But he has fans to help him make up for it -

From A Tom Cruise website:

"Tom Cruise has a lot of things, Tom Cruise has a yacht, a summer home, and a fleet of Mercedes. Tom Cruises is an incredible human being. Tom Cruise can shoot lasers from his eyes and fly. Tom Cruise controls the weather."

Tom Cruise will sue us all now ...
